queries.query: UPDATE COPARTICIPACAO.TB_ARQUIVO_OUTPUT_SHEET_COLS_DEF SET ID_VIEW_DESTINATION = ?, ID_VIEW_DESTINATION_COLS_DEF = ?, USER_ALTERED = ?, DT_ALTERED = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE ID = ?
INSERT INTO TB_ARQUIVO_OUTPUT_SHEET_COLS_DEF( ID_VIEW_DESTINATION, ID_VIEW_DESTINATION_COLS_DEF, USER_CREATED, DT_CREATED ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )
